definition: Global Times (weekly digest of international news from People's Daily 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4])

pinyin: Huan2 qiu2 Yin1 yue4 Ji2 tuan2

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足够的资金，我将完成一次环球旅行。

sentences.english: Have you found the model of SWFC at your own home?
sentences.chinese: 其实，环球的造型我们每个人家里都有。

sentences.english: The Voyage of Captain Woodes Rogers, round the world.
sentences.chinese: 上尉的伍兹罗杰斯环球航行。

sentences.english: And then you actually go on a bit of a tour around the reconstructed Globe Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 然后，你可以继续参观重修后的环球剧院。

sentences.english: It's the first submerged circumnavigation of the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一次核潜艇环球水下航行。

sentences.english: Many difficulties and dangers attended upon his single-handed voyage round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他独自一人作环球航行，遇到了很多困难和危险。

sentences.english: I write op-eds for GT's English edition (and China Daily).
sentences.chinese: 我给《环球时报》的英文版以及中国日报的专栏写稿。

sentences.english: This is Lucas from the Globisexualng Drilling Compa goody.
sentences.chinese: 我是环球钻井公司的鲁卡斯。

sentences.english: HGC reserves the right to revise these terms and conditions from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 和记环球电讯有权随时修改此协议内的各项条款。

sentences.english: The next decade she killed in two round-the-world journeys.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的10年她作了两次环球旅行。

sentences.english: He wishes to make a round- the -world tour.
sentences.chinese: 他希望能有一次环球旅行。

sentences.english: I'm quite sure that Uncle Li will make a round-the-world tour soon.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定李叔叔很快就要做一次环球旅行了。

sentences.english: Wai-Shin Chan is director of climate-change strategy, Asia Pacific, for HSBC Global Research.
sentences.chinese: 陈伟欣，汇丰环球研究气候变化策略亚太区总监。

sentences.english: Now Wang Junyan is the presenter for Universe TV's news programmes.
sentences.chinese: 现在王俊研已经是环球电视台新闻节目的主持人。

sentences.english: Proceed to one of the shopping centre at Batu Pahat.
sentences.chinese: 午餐后到环球购物中心购物。

definition: Disney (company name, surname)/also written 迪士尼[Di2 shi4 ni2]
theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
Disney (company name, surname)/Walt Disney (1901-1966), American animator and film producer
